posts.title: Moon Wall Light
posts.content: Enjoy a full moon every night and keep your bed room lit up with the Moon Wall Light. This bed room light has a built in sensor that activates the Moon’s illumination when the room starts getting dark and makes a cool gift for a kid’s room.

posts.title: Luggage Tracking Monitor
posts.content: Keep a close eye on your valuables while travelling with the luggage tracking monitor. Once placed inside the desired bag, it allows you to use your phone to keep tabs on it’s location once the plane lands so you have one less thing to worry about while abroad.

posts.title: Power Broiler Blowtorch Converter
posts.content: Give your dishes a professional quality sear without accidentally burning them to a crisp using this power broiler blowtorch converter. After attaching it to a blowtorch, it utilizes two layers of temperature-resistant wire mesh to create an even flame for the perfect sear.

posts.title: Tactical Butt Stock Cheek Rest
posts.content: Keep your ammo handy at all times by placing this tactical butt stock cheek rest on your firearm. This right-handed non-slip cheek rest fits up to five cartridges along with a built-in utility pouch that’s ideal for storing your essentials.

posts.title: Glow In The Dark Ping Pong Set
posts.content: Keep the game going into the wee hours of the night with the glow in the dark ping pong set. The set reinvigorates your plain old ping pong table with all out extremely loud neon colors that come alive in the dark – beer pong anyone?

posts.title: Putin Riding A Bear Action Figure
posts.content: Look no further for the next centerpiece in your home than this action figure of the great Vladmir Putin riding a bear. This work of art displays the infamous leader of Russia in his natural state – riding a bear, shirtless, while wearing combat boots and camo pants.

posts.title: Bitch Mug
posts.content: Let your coworkers know who’s the queen bee at the office by sipping your coffee from this bitch mug. The clever design of the curvy handle completes the “itch” graphic on the mug that leaves nothing open to interpretation about who you really are.

posts.title: Unnecessary Quotation Marks Book
posts.content: When you need a break from TV but still want a good laugh, the Unnecessary Quotation Marks book delivers page after page of hilarious content. This entertaining read delivers various examples of quotations used for sarcastic and suggestive purposes.

posts.title: Laser Guided Scissors
posts.content: Quit making those sloppy cuts with your normal scissors – now you can cut stuff up with laser like precision thanks to these laser guided scissors! These scissors are perfect for arts and crafts, gift wrapping, scrap booking, and even cutting hair.

posts.title: Paracord Charging Cable
posts.content: This paracord charging cable is the ideal way to help your devices remain charged when you head outdoors. This two foot charging cable features waterproof caps at both ends to protect the cable from the elements, and unravels into 20 feet of usable paracord.

posts.title: Tactical Automobile Rescue Tool
posts.content: Ensure you have an exit strategy in the event of an automobile accident by keeping the tactical automobile rescue tool handy. Apart from containing a razor sharp blade, this compact tool also features a seatbelt cutter, a flashlight, and window puncher.

posts.title: Self-Stirring Camera Lens Mug
posts.content: Ensure your drinks are mixed to perfection by pouring them inside this self-stirring camera lens mug. It holds 11 ounces and is modeled after a  Canon EF 24-105mm camera lens – complete with a lens cover so you can take it on the go.
